headline: AM Applications (Metal and Polymer Parts) Industry Research Report 2025-2034: Expanding Deployment, Production-Scale Activity and Emerging Commercial Trends
summary: The report identifies expansive opportunities in additive manufacturing across aerospace, energy, and other industries, emphasizing the growing adoption of metal and polymer 3D printed parts for end-use production, tools, and prototypes, driven by trends and innovation from key players like SpaceX, Tesla, and GE Aerospace.Dublin, Feb. 27, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The "AM Applications Analysis: Parts Produced 2025-2034" report has been added to ResearchAndMarkets.com's offering.
